data.route_analysis: International flights available through major airports; local transport includes buses and taxis.
data.pricing_trends: Pricing has been increasing annually by 5-10% due to demand; budget travelers can find deals in off-peak periods.
data.seasonal_patterns: Peak season from June to September; off-peak from October to May.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking times are 3-6 months in advance for better deals.

destination_insights.route_analysis: International flights available through major airports; local transport includes buses and taxis.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Peak season from June to September; off-peak from October to May.
destination_insights.climate: Warm summers average 25-30°C; mild winters average 5-10°C.
destination_insights.culture: Rich in traditions; festivals celebrated widely throughout the year; gastronomy emphasizes local cuisine.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Pricing has been increasing annually by 5-10% due to demand; budget travelers can find deals in off-peak periods.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking times are 3-6 months in advance for better deals.
market_insights.demand: Growing interest in ecotourism and cultural experiences.
market_insights.competition: Mid-tier destinations are seeing a rise; key competitors include Thailand and Mexico for similar cultural experiences.

trend_insights.market_trends: Increased demand for sustainable travel options; travelers favor remote areas due to Covid-19.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are researching extensively online prior to booking; emphasis on reviews and testimonials.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Domestic travel is increasing; eco-friendly accommodations are a significant selling point.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Summer attracts more families; winter sees increased travel for winter sports.
